value.description: Beta Release; all components feature complete for 1.0

value.name: Zend_Db_Table
value.description: Lightweight OO interface to database tables and rowsets.

value.body: This issue is not exactly a duplicate, but when ZF-50 is solved, this issue will also be solved.
As of revision 3995, the use of inflectors has been eliminated from Zend_Db_Table.
Bookkeeping. Closing old issues and assigning them to the person who ultimately resolved the issue.
